Status.description: Current status of the listing (Active, Inactive, Under Review, etc.)

Reason.description: Reason for the listing status change or issue

SKU.description: Stock Keeping Unit for the product

ASIN.description: Unique Amazon Standard Identification Number for the product

Condition.description: Condition of the product (New, Used, Refurbished, etc.)

Status Change Date.description: Date when the status of the listing was last changed

Issue Description.description: Description of any issues with the product

dataEndTime.description: End time of the report data
